Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller.Payments

Class PaymentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.Payments.PaymentController
public class PaymentController extends Object
This class is a controller of paymentView is used to handle all class its view and generate the functionality of all methods and attributes of this class.
Author:
Jefersson Coronel

    • updateThePaymentMethod

      public void updateThePaymentMethod(javafx.scene.control.Button buttonSelected, javafx.scene.control.RadioButton paymentSelected)
      This method is used to set de status of bottoms for do only one action when the user choose.
      Parameters:
      buttonSelected - This parameter is used to check the status of this bottom;
      paymentSelected - This attribute is used to show what action is selected by user.
